mapper.select: SELECT i.ill_id,i.ill_purse_id,d.dist_id,d.dist_installer,f.fly_id,f.fly_name,f.fly_area_id,f.fly_phone,f.fly_IDcard,f.fly_doorNum,f.fly_birthday FROM `install` i INNER JOIN dist d ON d.dist_id = i.ill_dist_id INNER JOIN family f ON d.dist_fly_id = f.fly_id WHERE d.dist_status = 1 AND f.fly_area_id = #{areaId} AND i.ill_status = 0

SELECT i.ill_id,i.ill_purse_id,d.dist_id,d.dist_installer,f.fly_id,f.fly_name,f.fly_area_id,f.fly_phone,f.fly_IDcard,f.fly_doorNum,f.fly_birthday FROM `install` i INNER JOIN dist d ON d.dist_id = i.ill_dist_id INNER JOIN family f ON d.dist_fly_id = f.fly_id WHERE d.dist_status = 1 AND f.fly_area_id = #{areaId} AND i.ill_status = 1

SELECT f.`fly_id`, f.`fly_name`,CONCAT(q.qu,q.jiedao,q.cunweihui,f.`fly_address`,f.`fly_doorNum`) AS fly_address ,p.`purse_instPtl`,f.`fly_phone`,t.tem_id,t.`tem_name` FROM family f ,team t ,(SELECT a5.`area_id`, a3.`area_name` qu,a4.`area_name` jiedao,a5.`area_name` cunweihui FROM `area` a1,`area` a2,`area` a3 ,`area` a4,`area` a5 WHERE a1.`area_id`=a2.`area_parID` AND a2.`area_id`=a3.`area_parID` AND a3.`area_id`=a4.`area_parID` AND a4.`area_id`=a5.`area_parID`) q ,purchase p WHERE f.`fly_tem_id`=t.`tem_id` AND p.`purse_fly_id`=f.`fly_id` AND q.`area_id`= f.`fly_area_id`AND f.`fly_id` = #{flyId} limit 1
